content:
I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have real-time information on specific sales tax rates for individual stores or locations. Sales tax rates can vary depending on the state, county, and even city, so it's best to check with the store directly or your local government's website for the most up-to-date information.

In the United States, sales tax rates can range from 0% to over 10%, depending on the location. Some cities and states have different tax rates for different types of products, such as clothing, food, or electronics.

If you're planning to make a purchase, I recommend checking the store's website or contacting their customer service to ask about their sales tax rate. You can also check your local government's website or contact your local tax authority for more information on sales tax rates in your area.

Additionally, some stores may offer tax-free shopping or special promotions that can help you save money. It's always a good idea to ask about any available discounts or promotions when you're making a purchase!
